page.title: 17Coarse Fishing
page.content: There are{fishing clubs}all along the river in our area.{Brampton}club have 1km.,the{Offord and Buckden Fishing {Society}have fishing rights for 7km. of the river.{L.A.A.}have an island at Offord & a short stretch of the river.There has been coarse fishing along the river for many years. People come from a long way to fish at Offord.Practically all kinds of coarse fish are found in this stretch of river.{Roach, bream, chub, pike, {tench, rudd, perch, dace, gudgeon, eel and{stickleback}have been caught.The heaviest fish caught this year is a {carp,}which weighed{18lbs 12oz. Fishermen have found maggots, worms & bread paste are the best bait.The close season is{March 14th to June {16th}except for pike which is{March {14th to October 1st.
